name: Physics Rider
description:
RISE TO THE CHALLENGE! Are you smart enough to complete this challenging physics-based game? Use the different blocks provided to get the ball from Point A to the Goal.

Skyboxes made by Avionx can be found at https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-free-103633

Physics Rider Controls

Q & E to rotate blocks.

R to restart level.

Space to start game.

Esc to return to menu.

Left Click to move blocks around the screen.

Move & Rotate the blocks allowing the ball to roll/bounce around the scene and reach the golden goal.
